channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AZ

item.title: Report X-2024030970
item.description:
Report X-2024030970

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-26T15:10:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-15
  • City: GOODYEAR
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Hazmat was carefully unloaded out of a trailer, placed on correct trailer load belt were the package was slightly crushed by NC's, when pulled off belt to trailer the Hazmat was leaking. DescribePack: The cap of the Jerrican Bottle was torn allowing the product to leak out of the bottle DurationRel: 10 and MitigateEffect: Minimalization of excessive shaking of the bottle and keeping the bottle upright

item.title: Report X-2024030870
item.description:
Report X-2024030870

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-08
  • City: YUMA
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package came out of trailer leaking white powder. Package was immediately placed inside a hazmat tote in the upright position to prevent future damages. DescribePack: Package was cracked from the bottom, which is what caused the damage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed inside a red hazmat tote in the upright position.

item.title: Report X-2024030932
item.description:
Report X-2024030932

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-25T15:12:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-14
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS FOUND INSIDE OF VAN WITH THE BOX OPEN AND THE BOTTOM OF THE PLASTIC DRUM SPLIT IN THE SEAM AT THE BASE CAUSING THE POWDERED CHLORINE TO SPILL DescribePack: THE BOTTOM OF THE 5GAL PLASTIC DRUM BUSTED OPEN AT THE SEAM AS IF TOO FULL. THE CHLORINE WAS IN A PLASTIC BAG THAT TORE OPEN. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE CHLORINE WAS SWEPT UP AND EVERYTHING WAS PLACD IN A PLASTIC HAZMAT BAG AND THEN PLACED IN A HAZMAT TOTE. EVERYTHING WAS THEN MOVED TO THE QA REPACK STATION.

item.title: Report X-2024030728
item.description:
Report X-2024030728

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-25T15:12:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-08
  • City: TEMPE
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: X-2024030728: SequenceEvent: Package was found in a truck leaking, QA was notified and was moved to a lined HazMat tote with orientation labels up. DescribePack: Loose caps caused the inner containers to leak and damage the outer packaging. DurationRel: 6 and MitigateEffect: Package was taken out of the truck and placed into a lined HazMat tote with orientation label up to stop and further leaking. X-2024030731: SequenceEvent: Package was found leaking in a truck, QA was notified and placed into a lined HazMat tote with orientation labels up. DescribePack: Loose caps caused the inner containers to leak and damage the outer container. DurationRel: 6 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed into a lined HazMat tote with orientation labels up to prevent further leaks.

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found leaking during the loading phase, QA was notified and package was placed into a lined HazMat tote with orientation labels up. DescribePack: Loose caps caused the inner container to leak and damage the outer container. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed into a lined HazMat tote with orientation labels up to prevent further leaks.

  • Description: It was reported that 2-oz release of UN2680 "Lithium hydroxide" that was released from (1) a 20-pound plastic bag affecting the trailer floor. The bag was punctured by a forklift at the loading terminal.

item.title: Report E-2024030487
item.description:
Report E-2024030487

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-27T15:12:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-23
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: XPO reported a spill that occurred inside of a trailer but was moved to the dock in Phoenix, AZ. The spill consists of 2-5 gallon bladder bags inside of a box, product Emulsinator, which arrived from the previous terminal leaking from the inside of the box. The terminal estimated 2 gallons total were released, but no surfaces were impacted, only the box.

Report X-2024030686

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: From what we know either the spill occurred and the HESS wasn't complete or the hazmat wasn't shipped as the weight on the label is informing us. DescribePack: I wasn't able to find any holes and or punctures on the steel drum. DurationRel: 2000 and MitigateEffect: I don't know what to mitigate when their appears to be no sign of any contents in the drum.
